column1: Eastemnet is the wide land of Rohan east of the River Entwash until the Anduin
column2: the easternmost land of the kingdom.

column1: There were few fixed settlements here
column2: but many of the herdsmen of the Rohirrim lived a nomadic existence on the fields of the Eastemnet
column3: living out of temporary camps and driving their herds across the grasslands.
